scripts.k8s:cloud:dev:up: gcloud config set project helm-development1 && gcloud auth configure-docker && npm run build && docker build --no-cache -t helm-ui . && docker tag helm-ui eu.gcr.io/helm-management/helm-ui:1.0.0 && docker push eu.gcr.io/helm-management/helm-ui:1.0.0 && gcloud container clusters get-credentials --zone=europe-west2-a helm-cluster && kubectl apply -f run/k8s && kubectl get all -l group=helm
scripts.k8s:cloud:staging:up: gcloud config set project helm-staging && gcloud auth configure-docker && npm run build && docker build --no-cache -t helm-ui . && docker tag helm-ui eu.gcr.io/helm-management/helm-ui:1.0.0 && docker push eu.gcr.io/helm-management/helm-ui:1.0.0 && gcloud container clusters get-credentials --zone=europe-west2-a helm-cluster && kubectl apply -f run/k8s && kubectl get all -l group=helm
scripts.k8s:cloud:prod:up: gcloud config set project helm-production1 && gcloud auth configure-docker && npm run build && docker build --no-cache -t helm-ui . && docker tag helm-ui eu.gcr.io/helm-management/helm-ui:1.0.0 && docker push eu.gcr.io/helm-management/helm-ui:1.0.0 && gcloud container clusters get-credentials --zone=europe-west2-a helm-cluster && kubectl apply -f run/k8s && kubectl get all -l group=helm
